thoughts.text: I think it would be useful to get hyperlinks from a website.
thoughts.reasoning: Getting hyperlinks from a website can help me find related or relevant information and resources.
thoughts.plan: - Use the 'get_hyperlinks' command to retrieve the hyperlinks from the specified website.
thoughts.criticism: I should make sure to specify the correct website URL to avoid retrieving hyperlinks from the wrong website or encountering errors.
thoughts.speak: I would like to get hyperlinks from a website. I will use the 'get_hyperlinks' command to help me with this task.
